attributes.action: Stop restrictions on gatherings due to Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: For the goverment to lift the Covid rules completly and stop acting like a virus (not much like the flu) is something we should be scared of instead of allowing us to learn to liv with it live normal lives instead of codeming everyone into a fear of this virus. Allow familues tolive instead of hide and allow for us to reach a state of normality where we are not controlled by some new rules relating to covid let us make our own choices and abolish covid rules and laws completly.
attributes.background: Stop restrictions on peoples human rights. Stop being able to dictate what is Covid safe and what is not. Stop Restrictions on parents visiting schools for sports days and assemblys if held outside but can allow for people to gather for games at Wembley (ie: England v Germany 29th June 2021)

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

End all Coronavirus restrictions on 5 July: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589386

Remove all covid-19 restrictions on July 19th 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589632
